meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ancient.
meanings.sent1: The ancientness of the ruins amazed the visitors.
meanings.sent2: The ancientness of the artifact was evident from its weathered appearance.
meanings.sent3: The ancientness of the recipe made it seem like a culinary time capsule.
meanings.sent4: The ancientness of the forest whispered stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The ancientness of the tradition was deeply rooted in the community.

meanings.definition: The condition of being very old or ancient.
meanings.sent1: The ancientness of the book was evident from its yellowed pages.
meanings.sent2: The ancientness of the castle added to its mysterious aura.
meanings.sent3: The ancientness of the joke made it sound like it belonged in a history book.
meanings.sent4: The ancientness of the mountain range hinted at its long history.
meanings.sent5: The ancientness of the painting gave it a sense of wisdom beyond years.
